description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 3 (Materials) and 4 (Landscaping Scheme) of Appeal Decision ref. APP/R5510/W/22/3306805 dated 04-07-2023 (LBH ref. 7932/APP/2021/4652) (Erection of a greenkeepers storage facility (stand alone unit).)
decision_conditions: The demolition of the two existing buildings shall be carried out in accordance with the demolition schedule hereby approved. Immediately post demolition of these buildings and prior to the operational use of the greenkeepers storage facility, the restoration of remaining landscaping shall be carried out. This shall include the removal of any foundations associated with the demolished buildings and implementation of soft landscaping to match the appearance of the existing landscaping.
